sentences: Ma ütleksin talle, et see on hea mõte.
Ta ütleksin, et ta armastab mind.
Kui ma ütleksin talle seda, siis ta oleks väga üllatunud.
context: The word "ütleksin" is the first person singular conditional form of the verb "ütlema", which means to say or tell in Estonian. It is commonly used in sentences to express what someone would say or do in a hypothetical situation.
